00016 /* some protocoles*/
00017 #define IPPROTO_ARP 1544
00018 #define IPPROTO_RARP 13696
00019 
00020 /* default snap length (maximum bytes per packet to capture) */
00021 #define SNAP_LEN 1518
00022 
00023 /* ethernet headers are always exactly 14 bytes [1] */
00024 #define SIZE_ETHERNET 14
00025 
00026 /* Ethernet addresses are 6 bytes */
00027 #define ETHER_ADDR_LEN  6
00028 
00029 /* Ethernet header */
00030 struct sniff_ethernet {
00031         u_char  ether_dhost[ETHER_ADDR_LEN];    /* destination host address */
00032         u_char  ether_shost[ETHER_ADDR_LEN];    /* source host address */
00033         u_short ether_type;                     /* IP? ARP? RARP? etc */
00034 };
00035 
00036 /* IP header */
00037 struct sniff_ip {
00038         u_char  ip_vhl;                 /* version << 4 | header length >> 2 */
00039         u_char  ip_tos;                 /* type of service */
00040         u_short ip_len;                 /* total length */
00041         u_short ip_id;                  /* identification */
00042         u_short ip_off;                 /* fragment offset field */
00043         #define IP_RF 0x8000            /* reserved fragment flag */
00044         #define IP_DF 0x4000            /* dont fragment flag */
00045         #define IP_MF 0x2000            /* more fragments flag */
00046         #define IP_OFFMASK 0x1fff       /* mask for fragmenting bits */
00047         u_char  ip_ttl;                 /* time to live */
00048         u_char  ip_p;                   /* protocol */
00049         u_short ip_sum;                 /* checksum */
00050         struct  in_addr ip_src,ip_dst;  /* source and dest address */
00051 };
00052 #define IP_HL(ip)               (((ip)->ip_vhl) & 0x0f)
00053 #define IP_V(ip)                (((ip)->ip_vhl) >> 4)
00054 
00055 /* TCP header */
00056 typedef u_int tcp_seq;
00057 
00058 struct sniff_tcp {
00059         u_short th_sport;               /* source port */
00060         u_short th_dport;               /* destination port */
00061         tcp_seq th_seq;                 /* sequence number */
00062         tcp_seq th_ack;                 /* acknowledgement number */
00063         u_char  th_offx2;               /* data offset, rsvd */
00064 #define TH_OFF(th)      (((th)->th_offx2 & 0xf0) >> 4)
00065         u_char  th_flags;
00066         #define TH_FIN  0x01
00067         #define TH_SYN  0x02
00068         #define TH_RST  0x04
00069         #define TH_PUSH 0x08
00070         #define TH_ACK  0x10
00071         #define TH_URG  0x20
00072         #define TH_ECE  0x40
00073         #define TH_CWR  0x80
00074         #define TH_FLAGS        (TH_FIN|TH_SYN|TH_RST|TH_ACK|TH_URG|TH_ECE|TH_CWR)
00075         u_short th_win;                 /* window */
00076         u_short th_sum;                 /* checksum */
00077         u_short th_urp;                 /* urgent pointer */
00078 };
00079 
00080 /*  udp header*/
00081 struct sniff_udp{
00082   u_short uh_sport;
00083   u_short uh_dport;
00084   u_short uh_len;
00085   u_short uh_sum;
00086 
00087 
00088 };
00089 /*icmp header */
00090 struct sniff_icmp{
00091   u_char itype;
00092   u_char icode;
00093   u_short icontr;
00094   
00095 };

00106 int send_packet_to_client(u_char* , int, int *);
